# HKMetadataKeyAppleECGAlgorithmVersion

**Global Variable**

A key for metadata indicating the version number of the algorithm Apple Watch uses to generate an ECG reading.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyAppleECGAlgorithmVersion: String
```

## Discussion

Apple Watch sets this key on the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKElectrocardiogram] samples it creates. The key is read-only.

## Specifying Metadata

- **HKAppleECGAlgorithmVersion**: Version numbers for the algorithm Apple Watch uses to generate an ECG reading.
